CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper July 27, 1957, pg. A2, reads: "Restaurant Inspection - In a demonstration at Municipal Hospital, headquarters of the Health Department, Thomas Owens, new sanitarian, takes notes as Health Supervisor Thomas Gable checks to see if the refrigerator is of the right temperature for food. This is one phase of restaurant inspection. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Allegheny County Health Department supervisor Thomas Gable holding thermometer and sanitarian Thomas Owens taking notes, standing in front of industrial refrigerator in Health Department headquarters
